title: Brazil: former finance minister arrested in Petrobras probe
text:
Authorities in Brazil have arrested Antonio Palocci, a former finance minister and senior figure in the last two governments.

Palocci was Lula's finance min & Dilma's chief of staff but resigned in both cases due to allegations of corruption https://t.co/ARyy4dOezF — Order and Progress (@ordprogbrazil) September 26, 2016

Palocci was arrested in Sao Paolo on suspicion of being linked to bribes paid by the construction company Odebrecht, one of the main firms involved in the huge Petrobras pay-to-play scandal.

Palocci served as finance minister under Lula da Silva and as chief of staff for Dilma Rousseff. He was also a key figure in the leftist Workers Party.
